rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with Art Deco motifs and natural lighting from large windows
An expansive living room designed in the Art Deco style with high ceilings and natural ventilation; includes built-in seating areas and decorative light fixtures
Modern kitchen adhering to Vastu principles with proper alignment for energy flow, equipped with ample storage and a central island
Dedicated home theater room with soundproof insulation and ambient lighting; designed to support family gatherings and movie nights

openings.description: Large window to enhance natural light and airflow
